title: Lord of The Flies star, 10, made 'friends for life' filming in Malaysia
description: Alfie Kiely spent three months in Malaysia while shooting Lord of the Flies, playing one of the "Littluns".
content:
A 10-year-old actor has said he was "speechless" when he got cast in a new BBC drama that was filmed thousands of miles from home.
Alfie Kiely from Caldicot, Monmouthshire, spent three months in Malaysia while shooting Lord of the Flies, playing one ... [2553 chars]

title: US-South Africa funding: As American cash dries up the fight to stop Aids gets harder
description: Health experts fear that as testing and monitoring drops the risk of the further spread of HIV rises.
content:
The impact of a flourish of the US president's pen in Washington a year ago continues to be felt on individual lives some 13,000km (8,000 miles) away in South Africa.
There was a collective gulp among some in the health sector here when, hours after ... [6861 chars]

title: Labour minister commissioned report on journalists
description: Exclusive: Material gathered was personally given to Josh Simons when director of pro-Starmer thinktank, say sources
content:
A Labour minister commissioned and reviewed a report in 2023 on journalists investigating the thinktank that would help propel Keir Starmer to power, the Guardian has learned.
The research was paid for and subsequently reviewed by Josh Simons, now a ... [7123 chars]

title: Davis Cup LIVE: Norway v Great Britain
description: Great Britain beat Norway 4-0 to reach the second round of qualifying for November's eight-team Davis Cup Finals.
content:

So, victory for Great Britain!

title: £99,987 and counting: graduates trapped by ballooning student loans
description: As their debts rise, graduates reveal how loans are reshaping careers, finances and faith in the system
content:
Growing anger over the plight of millions of graduates saddled with ballooning student loan debts is threatening to develop into a fresh crisis for the government, with Martin Lewis leading the demands for an urgent rethink.
